project.name: SpringRoll Container
project.description: The iframe controller for interacting with SpringRoll applications

params.name: iframeSelector
params.description: jQuery selector for application iframe container

props.name: sfxButton
props.description: jQuery selector for sounf effects button

props.name: pauseFocusSelector
props.description:
The class to pause
       the application when focused on. This is useful for form elements which
       require focus and play better with Application's keepFocus option.

springroll.SavedDataHandler.name: springroll.SavedDataHandler
springroll.SavedDataHandler.description:
Default user data handler for the {{#crossLink "springroll.Container"}}Container{{/crossLink}} to save data using
the {{#crossLink "springroll.SavedData"}}SavedData{{/crossLink}} class.

classitems.description:
The external handler class, must include `remove`, `write`, `read` methods
make it possible to use something else to handle the external, default
is to use cookies/localStorage. See {{#crossLink "springroll.SavedDataHandler"}}{{/crossLink}}
as an example.

classitems.description: Set the captions styles
classitems.name: setCaptionsStyles

params.name: styles
params.description:
The style options or the name of the
property (e.g., "color", "edge", "font", "background", "size")

props.name: color
props.description: The text color, the default is white

props.name: edge
props.description: The edge style, default is none

props.name: font
props.description: The font style, default is arial

props.name: size
props.description: The font style default is medium

props.name: align
props.description: The align style default is top of the window

params.name: value
params.description: If setting styles parameter as a string, this is the value of the property.
